title: Hong Kong opposition hopes for protest votes vs. China
text:
Hong Kong opposition hopes for protest votes vs. China 2:14pm GMT - 02:08 
Hong Kong by-elections may be make-or-break for the city's democrats; if they don't win, they may lose much of their legislative clout. As Reuters Venus Wu explains, the pro-democrats hope the polls will draw out votes of protest versus what some perceive as creeping Chinese influence.

As Reuters Venus Wu explains, the pro-democrats hope the polls will draw out votes of protest versus what some perceive as creeping Chinese influence.  //reut.rs/2p0pUq3
